column1: Radhruin (died ) was a member of Barahirs Outlaw Band.

Radhruin fought in the Dagor Bragollach under the command Barahir. He was part of a small group of men loyal to their lord that survived. The survivors formed a small band and lived as Barahirs Outlaw Band in Dorthonion
They lived in hiding for some time
column2: until Morgoths agents captured Gorlim and coerced him into giving the location of their hideaway. Orcs were sent to raid it
column3: and succeeded. Radhruin and the other outlaws were killed. Only Beren survived
column4: as he had been away on an errand.
